targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 1 Spannung" AS metric,
  avg(dc1Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and dc1Voltage > 300
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 1 Spannung (max)" AS metric,
  max(dc1Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and dc1Voltage > 300
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 1 Spannung (min)" AS metric,
  min(dc1Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and hour(timestamp) between 11 and 15
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 2 Spannung" AS metric,
  avg(dc2Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and dc2Voltage > 300
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 2 Spannung (max)" AS metric,
  max(dc2Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and dc2Voltage > 300
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT
  date(timestamp) AS "time",
  "String 2 Spannung (min)" AS metric,
  min(dc2Voltage) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and hour(timestamp) between 11 and 15
GROUP by to_days(timestamp)

SELECT  
TIMESTAMP as "Time",
operatingStatus as StatusCode
FROM (
    SELECT
        operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP,
        @rn := CASE WHEN (@prev <> operatingStatus) THEN @rn+1 ELSE @rn END AS rn,
    	@prev := operatingStatus
    FROM (
        SELECT operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP
        FROM WR_Daten
        WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
        ORDER BY ID ) AS a , 
        (SELECT @prev := -1, @rn := 0) AS vars 
) T1 Group BY rn ORDER BY `T1`.`time_sec` ASC

SELECT
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%M %Y') as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as "Zeit",
operatingStatus as StatusCode,
( Case operatingStatus
  When 0 then 'off'
  When 1 then 'anfahren'
  When 2 then 'Leerlauf'  
  When 3 then 'Einspeisen (MPP)'
  When 4 then 'abgeregelt'
  When 5 then 'Einspeisen'
  Else 'undefined'
  End) as Status
FROM (
    SELECT
        operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP,
        @rn := CASE WHEN (@prev <> operatingStatus) THEN @rn+1 ELSE @rn END AS rn,
    	@prev := operatingStatus
    FROM (
        SELECT operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP
        FROM WR_Daten
        WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
        ORDER BY ID ) AS a , 
        (SELECT @prev := -1, @rn := 0) AS vars 
) T1 Group BY rn ORDER BY `T1`.`time_sec` DESC

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(min(TIMESTAMP))*3600 as time_sec,
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  1-LEAST(sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh),1) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
    DATE(TIMESTAMP) Between DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-01")) AND Last_DAY($__timeFrom())
GROUP BY HOUR(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec+3600 as time_sec,
  "WR" AS metric,
  max(acPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "PV Power"  AS metric,
  max(dcPowerPV) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec+2*3600 as time_sec,
  "Bat Power"  AS metric,
  max(BatPowerEntLaden) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
    time_sec+3*3600 as time_sec,
  "Bat Laden"  AS metric,
  max(BatPowerLaden) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
    time_sec+4*3600 as time_sec,
  "Einspeisen"  AS metric,
  max(EinspeisenPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  "AVG (per day)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m') as "Datum",
  avg(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  avg(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  avg(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  avg(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  avg(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  Date_format(min(TIMESTAMP),'%Y-%m') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (overall)" as "type",
  Date_format(min(TIMESTAMP),'%Y') as "Datum",
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  time_sec AS time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch,
  sum(PV_kWh) as Ertrag
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec AS time_sec,
  sum(Rad1Energy*DWD_SIM_Rad_factor.$fitmethod)/1000 as Prognose
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
Left Join DWD_SIM_Rad_factor on month=month(TIMESTAMP)
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec AS time_sec,
  sum(DCsim)/1000 as Prognose
FROM DWD_SIM_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  1-LEAST(sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh),1) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(ac_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh-BatLaden_kWh+BatEntladen_kWh) AS WR,
  avg(BatTemperature) as "Bat.Temperatur",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Anteil int. Laden"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat" AS metric,
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (incl WR)" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (Eigenverbrauch)" AS metric,
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionBat)/sum(acPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  AktHomeConsumptionBat>1 and dcPowerPV<1 and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (DC/DC/AC)" AS metric,
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh)*sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,ac_kWh,0))/sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,BatEntLaden_kWh,0)) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  1-sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "mit Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "ohne Bat"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS "mit Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS "ohne Bat"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  min(time_sec) as time,
  COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge > 99, 1, NULL))/60 as "bei 100%",
  COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge < 20, 1, NULL))/60 as "unter 20%",
  COUNT(if(BatStateOfCharge <= 5, 1, NULL))/60 as "unter 5%"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  dcPowerPV as value,
  "PV Power" as metric
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT
  time_sec,
  -(BatEntladen_kWh) as value,
  "Bat Entladen" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  BatLaden_kWh as value,
  "Bat Laden" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Autarkie" AS metric,
  Autarkie AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
